examples: Booksellers should easily be able to move this biography of Lincoln.
After reading her biography, I saw her accomplishments in a different light and gained a deeper admiration for her resilience and determination.
I have discovered biographies.
Earlier this year, I read Ron Chernow's magnificent biography of Ulysses S. Grant.
Earlier this year, I read Ron Chernow's magnificent biography of Ulysses S. Grant.
words.defineEn: the story of someone's life that is written by another person
words.defineVi: câu chuyện về cuộc đời của ai đó được viết bởi một người khác

words.defineEn: to be brought into this world through birth
words.defineVi: được đưa vào thế giới này thông qua sinh

examples: My grandparents have been married for over forty years.
David's uncle married money when he wed a rich woman who owned a big company.
Nicholas and his better half, Rachel, have been happily married for over 20 years.
They were very unhappily married but kept up appearances for the sake of their children.
Many people choose not to marry.
words.defineEn: to become someone's husband or wife
words.defineVi: trở thành vợ hoặc chồng của ai đó

words.defineEn: to legally become someone's wife or husband
words.defineVi: để hợp pháp trở thành vợ hoặc chồng của một ai đó

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

words.defineEn: the school for young children, usually between the age of 5 to 11 in the UK
words.defineVi: trường học dành cho trẻ nhỏ, thường từ 5 đến 11 tuổi ở Vương quốc Anh

examples: That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The group has a new CD in the pipeline.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: to be pregnant or give birth to a baby
words.defineVi: mang thai hoặc sinh em bé

examples: The children enjoyed a refreshing slice of watermelon on a hot summer day.
Parents often support their children financially during college.
The children threw the crumpled paper balls into the classroom trash can.
The children decorated their cupcakes on a colorful dish.
The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.
words.defineEn: a young person who has not reached puberty or adulthood yet
words.defineVi: một người trẻ chưa đến tuổi dậy thì hoặc trưởng thành

words.defineEn: the school for young people, usually between the ages of 11 to 16 or 18 in the UK
words.defineVi: trường học dành cho những người trẻ tuổi, thường ở độ tuổi từ 11 đến 16 hoặc 18 ở Vương quốc Anh

examples: We have a university lecture on art history this afternoon.
The university is working to raise the number of students from state schools.
She attends a prestigious university known for its engineering program.
I will graduate from university next year with a degree in psychology.
This candidate is fresh from university and has no teaching experience.
words.defineEn: an educational institution at the highest level, where we can study for a degree or do research
words.defineVi: một tổ chức giáo dục ở cấp cao nhất, nơi chúng ta có thể học để lấy bằng hoặc nghiên cứu

examples: His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.
Red wine leaves a stain.
Leaves change colour in autumn.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: to go away from somewhere or someone
words.defineVi: đi khỏi một nơi nào đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: Schools have welcomed such arrangements with open arms.
The school took the full force of the explosion.
She left school at 16.
Many schools don’t take full advantage of the Internet.
The kids always work hard at school.
words.defineEn: a place where children learn things from teachers
words.defineVi: một nơi mà trẻ em học những điều từ giáo viên

examples: They're separating.
He separated the wheat from the chaff in hopes of improving productivity.
The closet had a separate section for hanging long garments like coats and dresses.
With a knife, he separated the endosperm from the seed, revealing its starchy and nutrient-rich composition.
They peeled and separated the orange segments to make a fruit salad.
words.defineEn: not connected to anything, and forming a unit by itself
words.defineVi: không được kết nối với bất cứ thứ gì và tự nó tạo thành một đơn vị

examples: 95 per cent of the UK can now get superfast broadband.
This room gets very little sunshine.
Get a load of that dress Mag!
Get a load of George over there.
The police got wind of the illegal drug deal.
words.defineEn: to receive or come to have something
words.defineVi: để nhận hoặc đến để có một cái gì đó

examples: His carelessness lost him the job.
Jobs that pay £5 an hour.
This job puts years on you.
My job is the tough one.
The team's new manager brings ten years' experience to the job.
words.defineEn: the work that we do regularly to earn money
words.defineVi: công việc mà chúng tôi làm thường xuyên để kiếm tiền

examples: His life fell to pieces after his divorce.
He bared his soul to me after the divorce.
She came out of the divorce settlement a rich woman.
After his divorce he took to the bottle.
The judge will have the last word on the divorce agreement.
words.defineEn: to legally end a marriage
words.defineVi: để kết thúc một cách hợp pháp một cuộc hôn nhân

examples: I was recently divorced and feeling at a very low ebb.
I had just gotten divorced and it was what you do when you get divorced.
Or maybe it's a marriage and you get divorced.
Katie lives above the pub run by her divorced dad.
But thirties to fifties: lawyers, you want lawyer friends cause you're gonna, you're gonna get divorced.
words.defineEn: no longer married to someone because the marriage has been legally ended
words.defineVi: không còn kết hôn với ai đó vì cuộc hôn nhân đã kết thúc hợp pháp

examples: Employees can retire at 60 if they choose.
Jim retired to raise raspberries.
When the CEO retired, the board of directors made the mistake of promoting the inexperienced intern to take his place.
Since he retired, Bill has too much time on his hands.
Even though I’ve retired, I still get up at 7 am by force of habit.
words.defineEn: to leave one's job and stop working, usually on reaching a certain age
words.defineVi: rời bỏ công việc của một người và ngừng làm việc, thường là khi đến một độ tuổi nhất định

words.defineEn: to start loving someone deeply
words.defineVi: để bắt đầu yêu ai đó sâu sắc

examples: The old customs are dying.
All men must die.
The flowers died during a dry spell.
My father died suddenly at the age of 48.
The die is cast.
words.defineEn: to no longer be alive
words.defineVi: không còn sống
